channel.title: Pi bankpin
channel.description: Wll i just added bank pin the interface pops up and everything, works perfectly but one problem when u open the bank u can enter any random pin how can i make it set a pin?

item.title: Pi bankpin
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Make a command or a new input command (which would require client sided editting).
I think the set PIN interface would take too much work.
As for the player communication , use dialogues in between the player and the banker NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi bankpin
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Create a saving method in PlayerSave.Java and a requirement in whereever your pin system is.

Read full topic
